long_description: The Wheeleez Tuff Tire kayak cart schleps your boat to the water so you can concentrate on taking it easy and prepping your gear. 10.2 in. tires cruise easily over beach terrain and detach quickly with clip pins. Foam-filled tires offer high durability and will not go flat; the Wheeleez Tuff Tire kayak cart is an excellent choice for tough terrain with sharp rocks. Durable, aluminum frame collapses to fit into most kayak hatches. Rubber pads carefully cradle your kayak's hull; comes with two 13 ft. tie-down straps to secure boat.
short_description: The Wheeleez Tuff Tire kayak cart schleps your boat to the water so you can concentrate on taking it easy and prepping your gear.
